name: Idly
description: A classic pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil on a thin and crispy crust.

name: Pav Bhaji
description: A spicy mashed vegetable curry served with buttered, toasted pav (bread rolls) and garnished with onions and lemon.

name: Rasmalai
description: Succulent steak cooked to your preference, served with crispy golden fries and herb butter.

name: Chicken Biryani
description: Aromatic basmati rice layered with spiced chicken and herbs, slow-cooked to create a rich, flavorful one-pot dish.

name: Chicken Tikka
description: Succulent chunks of chicken marinated in spiced yogurt, skewered and grilled to perfection in a traditional tandoor.

name: Fish Curry
description: Fresh fish simmered in a rich, spiced coconut or tomato-based gravy, typical of coastal Indian cuisine.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: A classic pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil on a thin and crispy crust.

name: Crab Curry
description: An assortment of fresh sushi rolls including California, Spicy Tuna, and Eel Avocado.

name: Chicken Curry
description: Tender chicken pieces cooked in a spiced onion-tomato gravy, slow-simmered for deep flavor.

name: Palak Panneer
description: Creamy spinach curry cooked with soft cubes of paneer (Indian cottage cheese) and aromatic spices.

name: Pasta
description: Penne pasta tossed in a rich tomato sauce, garnished with cherry tomatoes, grated Parmesan, and fresh herbs.

name: Mushroom Curry
description: A warming bowl of ramen with miso broth, tender pork, soft-boiled egg, and green onions.

name: Veggie Burger
description: Layers of breaded eggplant, marinara sauce, and melted mozzarella and parmesan cheeses.

name: Samosa
description: A crispy, deep-fried pastry filled with spiced potatoes and peas, often served with tangy chutneys.

name: Chicken Shawarma Wrap
description: Tender slices of marinated chicken wrapped in a soft pita with fresh veggies and creamy garlic sauce.

name: Spring Potato
description: Crispy spiral-cut potatoes seasoned with herbs and spices.

name: Jalebi
description: Crispy, spiral-shaped dessert soaked in saffron-infused sugar syrup, served hot and sweet.

name: Pancake Stack
description: Fluffy pancakes stacked high, drizzled with maple syrup and topped with fresh berries.

name: Lemon Cheesecake
description: A creamy cheesecake with a tangy lemon flavor, served on a crumbly biscuit base.

name: Chocolate Brownie
description: A rich and fudgy brownie, topped with a scoop of vanilla ice cream and chocolate sauce.
